recommendations: Vignesh Kumar SUNDARARAJULU “Anshika & I worked for the same project. I had an oppurtnity to mentor her.It was a great pleasure and very good working Experience with her. She was very keen to go into details on each topic that we worked like Product development,Skill management,Functional management etc. She took a greater responsibility to make the transfomation in the Industilisaiton process. Always holding smile and speaking with confident made her as a go to person. I wish her great success for the future Endeavors. Regards”

Shashank Gupta “Anshika is wonderful to work with, and has exceptional expertise in coaching and motivation. She consistently demonstrated a solid work ethic plus a dedication to success. She is not only reliable and forward thinking Growth Head but also an inspiring team player. Her energy level and positive approach towards any task help the team to achieve targets month on month.”
